name: Ponify YouTube (My Little Pony Style)
description: A ponified version of YouTube. Minus recommended videos, plus cool CSS3 effects and ponies.
additional_info:
This theme was created for personal use and may contain bugs.

+ Quick and dirty fix for big screens. Not essential for anyone else.
+ YouTube updated its style or what? Fix the broken feed view
+ Moved the images to an independent image hosting, fixed a couple of issues
+ First release
